data.name: carl-olsen/brutal-helm
data.description: Long horns on each side of this helmet.

data.name: carl-olsen/crossbow
data.description: The Middle-Ages version of automatic riffles is much more powerful than a simple bow.

data.name: carl-olsen/flame
data.description: Dancing flames over the shadow.

data.name: carl-olsen/mite-alt
data.description: A friendly bug living in your cabinet.

data.name: carl-olsen/spider-alt
data.description: Placing webs in every corner to capture small insects for dinner.

data.name: carl-olsen/spider-face
data.description: Staring at you during your sleep.

data.name: cathelineau/annexation
data.description:
All your bases belong to us!
A military invasion in an enemy country to take it under permanent control.

data.name: cathelineau/bad-gnome
data.description: An evil ball of fur with a mask and a cap.

data.name: cathelineau/battleship
data.description: A heavy armored warship navigating the seven seas.

data.name: cathelineau/boar-ensign
data.description: A wild pig emblem

data.name: cathelineau/carnyx
data.description: Gallic trumpet designed to howl a disturbing war-song.

data.name: cathelineau/carrier
data.description: A floating military airport which serves as a tactical advanced position.

data.name: cathelineau/chariot
data.description: A light vehicle pulled by horses in epic races on sand tracks.

data.name: cathelineau/cruiser
data.description: A medium recognition frigate with a few cannons with a few cannons.

data.name: cathelineau/dread
data.description: Intense fear about a danger.

data.name: cathelineau/dreadnought
data.description: A massive battleship from the Royal Navy.

data.name: cathelineau/earth-worm
data.description: The small and gooey invertebrate living in moist underground doesn't want to go fishing.

data.name: cathelineau/flying-trout
data.description: When you are both a bird and a fish and you're comfortable with it.

data.name: cathelineau/fomorian
data.description: Ancient and hideous folk haunting cemeteries like zombies. They will remain lonely souls for eternity.

data.name: cathelineau/great-war-tank
data.description: A heavy armored tank on the battlefield.

data.name: cathelineau/holy-oak
data.description: That tree is a sacred one, see it shining. Druids and elves will pray at this sacred place to gather mana.

data.name: cathelineau/iron-hulled-warship
data.description: Ironclads are ancient steam propelled ships with heavy armor and big sails.

data.name: cathelineau/medusa-head
data.description: Dozen of snakes are swarming the crown of this petrifying Gorgon, that can turn the victims into stone.

data.name: cathelineau/nun-face
data.description: A religious Sister.

data.name: cathelineau/occupy
data.description: The siege is over. Tanks are spreading through the city streets that had surrendered.

data.name: cathelineau/old-king
data.description: This old leader relies on wisdom and strength to rule his kingdom.

data.name: cathelineau/oppidum
data.description: Gallic cities were on top of hills between wood walls.

data.name: cathelineau/polar-bear
data.description: A white bear living in Arctic areas, near the North Pole. It mainly eat fish to survive.

data.name: cathelineau/swordman
data.description: A fighter with blade and shield.

data.name: cathelineau/swordwoman
data.description: A female fighter in the rage of a battle.

data.name: cathelineau/torc
data.description: A twisted necklace very hard to remove.

data.name: cathelineau/transparent-slime
data.description: A jelly creature with no opacity that can flatten itself to pass underneath low obstacle.

data.name: cathelineau/tree-face
data.description: Wooden mask carved in the trunk of an old tree. The hollow eyes and mouth may be filled with magic items.

data.name: cathelineau/tumulus
data.description: Ancient respected warchiefs were buried in huge handmade hills.

data.name: cathelineau/witch-face
data.description: An old and ugly shrew living in a dirty shack in the deep forest, mixing magic potions.

data.name: catsu/broken-arrow
data.description: This arrow is shattered like glass.

data.name: darkzaitzev/acrobatic
data.description: Quick agile moves in the air, harmoniously jumping from ropes, cables or small platforms.

data.name: darkzaitzev/apothecary
data.description: Large bowl to prepare mixtures and medicines by combining herbs and special potions.

data.name: darkzaitzev/big-gear
data.description: This massive cog is tough enough to rotate inside battleship mechanical engines.

data.name: darkzaitzev/catch
data.description: You need good reflexes and grip to catch this thrown stick in mid-air with your bare hands.

data.name: darkzaitzev/cauldron
data.description: To boil weird liquid preparations, like mana soup or melted frog juice with cinnamon.

data.name: darkzaitzev/chameleon-glyph
data.description: This master of disguise of the animal reign curls tightly when it needs to rest.

data.name: darkzaitzev/death-juice
data.description: Drop from the after-world. At first it may be confused with blood or bone marrow.

data.name: darkzaitzev/distraction
data.description: Hard to stay focus on a task when something else very interesting occurs around.

data.name: darkzaitzev/fish-cooked
data.description: A salmon on a stick over a campfire. It's less sweet than marshmallow but give more energy.

data.name: darkzaitzev/flying-shuriken
data.description: Like a metal falcon approaching it's prey at high speed.

data.name: darkzaitzev/fried-fish
data.description: With French fries and a bit of lemon juice, this anchovy or herring will be a salty meal.

data.name: darkzaitzev/hooded-assassin
data.description: The dagger of this murderer is ready to dive deep in the heart of the victim during this occult ceremony.

data.name: darkzaitzev/hooded-figure
data.description: This mysterious being hidden under a large cloak runs swiftly through the twilight. It may be a ranger or an elf.

data.name: darkzaitzev/kusarigama
data.description: This chain-sickle is a sharp traditional Japanese weapon used during the Middle Ages.

data.name: darkzaitzev/ninja-head
data.description: Only the eyes are visible behind this mask. This way there's no way to recognize the assassin.

data.name: darkzaitzev/ninja-heroic-stance
data.description: This Asian warrior is about to confront its worst opponents and enter the scene in a dramatic way.

data.name: darkzaitzev/north-star-shuriken
data.description: When you see it in the night sky, it may be too late for you.

data.name: darkzaitzev/on-sight
data.description: That is a scary situation when someone is aiming at you with a sniper rifle and you can't move.

data.name: darkzaitzev/plants-and-animals
data.description: A snake surrounding a young crop. Symbol of harmony between fauna and flora in nature.

data.name: darkzaitzev/ram
data.description: This goat like animal stinks a lot and hit very hard with the huge horns on the top of its head.

data.name: darkzaitzev/revolt
data.description: Ready to go on strike by mobilizing the angry mob and fight against the government.

data.name: darkzaitzev/robber-hand
data.description: This nice purse full of coins is a temptation that a thief can't resist to steal.

data.name: darkzaitzev/running-ninja
data.description: This dark shadow was jumping from roof to roof before it dashes in a desert alley.

data.name: darkzaitzev/severed-hand
data.description: Those five fingers are no longer connected to the rest of the arm. In the separating process, the watch has been lost.

data.name: darkzaitzev/sharp-shuriken
data.description: This rotating razor can fit in a small bag. So you can carry a lot.

data.name: darkzaitzev/shuriken
data.description: Small metal star, spinning in the air until it reaches a soft target and remain stuck.

data.name: darkzaitzev/skull-sabertooth
data.description: This long teeth had made big damages while they were attached to a living head.

data.name: darkzaitzev/smoke-bomb
data.description: For a quick evasion, this ball emits large amount of opaque gas that blinds enemies.

data.name: darkzaitzev/star-shuriken
data.description: Simple spinning star used during martial art combats.

data.name: darkzaitzev/tabi-boot
data.description: Light shoes with no hard sole producing loud noises. This way discretion is optimal.

data.name: darkzaitzev/three-pointed-shuriken
data.description: Three blades are interconnected in the center by a metal ring. But it can only follow one path.

data.name: darkzaitzev/whirlpool-shuriken
data.description: Like a small tornado made of blades that could also be taken from a power tool saw.

data.name: delapouite/3d-hammer
data.description: To hit on metal in a forge and produce perfect blades.

data.name: delapouite/3d-meeple
data.description: A small wooden character used as tokens by each player. This placeholder is placed on a board to show the game progress.

data.name: delapouite/3d-stairs
data.description: A staircase to reach the deeper level of a dungeon or, on the contrary, escape from the darkness one step at the time.

data.name: delapouite/abacus
data.description: Wooden balls used to count or tally before computers and their infinite power over numbers were everywhere.

data.name: delapouite/abbot-meeple
data.description: A monk in charge of sharing the holy knowledged to surrounding folks.

data.name: delapouite/achilles-heel
data.description:
This kind of non obvious weak point can turn into a crucial vulnerability when discovered.
At least it's not an arrow in the knee!

data.name: delapouite/acoustic-megaphone
data.description: Simple way to scream loudly to a crowd during a strike to give it instructions or orders.

data.name: delapouite/africa
data.description: This continent is considered the crib of mankind. The north part is covered with desert.

data.name: delapouite/agave
data.description: This dry plant growing in the desert is used to produce Tequila.

data.name: delapouite/ages
data.description: An adult and a child side by side. One person is old and wise, the other one is young and quick.

data.name: delapouite/air-balloon
data.description: Hot and slow balloon to travel in the clouds and go around the world in less than 80 days.

data.name: delapouite/airtight-hatch
data.description: This pressurized environment rely on a thick automated seal to protect the inside from the void.

data.name: delapouite/akhet
data.description: A hieroglyph representing the sun rising over a mountain.

data.name: delapouite/alarm-clock
data.description: Produces a strident ring to wake you up in the morning. If the hands are not phosphorescent, it's impossible to tell the time in dark room at night.

data.name: delapouite/algae
data.description: Aquatic plants living on rocks at the bottom of the ocean. It's often a shelter for fish and can even be turned into an edible salad.

data.name: delapouite/algeria
data.description: Country located north of Africa, on the south bank of the Mediterannean sea.

data.name: delapouite/alien-bug
data.description: An insectoid alien living in swarm colony and multiplying at big scale in no time.

data.name: delapouite/alien-egg
data.description: A monstrous baby about to emerge from its viscous incubation cocoon and start hunting.

data.name: delapouite/all-seeing-eye
data.description: The Eye of providence casting rays. God is watching you, even from dollar bills.

data.name: delapouite/almond
data.description: A dry nut used to make milk, cake and biscuits.

data.name: delapouite/amber-mosquito
data.description: A disturbing blood sucker from Jurassic trapped in stone. It contains previous DNA necessary to bring back to life extinct species like dinosaurs.

data.name: delapouite/ambulance
data.description: An emergency transportation to carry injured people to the nearest hospital in a hurry.

data.name: delapouite/american-football-ball
data.description: Give it to the quarterback to score. The rugby ball is quite similar, looking like a long egg.

data.name: delapouite/american-football-helmet
data.description: To protect the quaterback's head when the ball is dropping.

data.name: delapouite/american-football-player
data.description: A light armor is necessary to run across the field as a quarterback.

data.name: delapouite/american-shield
data.description: Made from Vibranium, the Captain's shield is virtually indestructible and usually comes back like a Frisbee.

data.name: delapouite/amphora
data.description: A Roman vase to hold wine or other precious liquids during banquets. Many fragments of amphora are found in archaeological site.

data.name: delapouite/ample-dress
data.description: A large skirt that may be worn during a wedding or a ceremony.

data.name: delapouite/anarchy
data.description: A political movement against establishment where decisions follow the will of the people.

data.name: delapouite/ancient-columns
data.description: 3 broken columns belonging to an old temple in ruins.

data.name: delapouite/ancient-ruins
data.description: An old temple falling apart with broken columns and rusty parts.

data.name: delapouite/ancient-screw
data.description: This bolt belongs to the carapace to old guardian robots.

data.name: delapouite/ancient-sword
data.description: This old sword is stuck in a stone and covered with moss.

data.name: delapouite/angola
data.description:
South african country bordered by the Atlantic Ocean.
The capital is Luanda.

data.name: delapouite/angry-eyes
data.description: Stare with frowned eyebrows, feeling anger.

data.name: delapouite/animal-hide
data.description:
Leather skin, gathered after hunting or farming.
This nice fur can then be turned into a pelt.

data.name: delapouite/ant
data.description: A small part of a coordinated crowd.

data.name: delapouite/antarctica
data.description: The frozen continent at the South Pole is full of mysteries under the thick ice.

data.name: delapouite/antibody
data.description: The immune system used this Y-shaped protein produced by plasma cells to neutralize pathogens like bacteria and viruses

data.name: delapouite/anticlockwise-rotation
data.description: An arrow turning from right to left in the top quadrant.

data.name: delapouite/ants
data.description: A colony of soldiers and workers contributing to the hive.

data.name: delapouite/anubis
data.description: Egyptian god of mummification with a jackal head, which looks like a wolf like invincible monster.

data.name: delapouite/apollo-capsule
data.description: A lunar module designed to carry astronauts back on earth.

data.name: delapouite/apple-core
data.description: This apple has been eaten and only the center remains with seeds.

data.name: delapouite/aquarium
data.description: A fish tank with a small bubbling goldfish swimming around endlessly. It waits for magic food falling from above.

data.name: delapouite/aquarius
data.description: A goddess pouring mighty water star constellation - Zodiacal sign from January to February

data.name: delapouite/aqueduct
data.description: Roman bridge transporting water across long distances to fill reservoirs.

data.name: delapouite/arabic-door
data.description: The beautifully decorated entrance of an Arabic temple, with colorful mosaic tiles.

data.name: delapouite/arc-triomphe
data.description: Famous monument of Paris, at the top of the Champs-Élysées on la Place de l'Étoile.

data.name: delapouite/arch-bridge
data.description: The big pillars of this structure enhance the balance of the arch.

data.name: delapouite/archer
data.description: Calm and concentration must be mastered to aim in the bull eyes.

data.name: delapouite/archive-research
data.description: Mysteries are hidden in these pages, a scholar exploring the library should be able to find them.

data.name: delapouite/aries
data.description: Ram star constellation - Zodiacal sign from March to April

data.name: delapouite/arm-bandage
data.description: An injury between the elbow and the shoulder, with straps to avoid infection.

data.name: delapouite/arm-sling
data.description: This injury at the broken elbow needs a plaster to full recovery.

data.name: delapouite/arm
data.description: Superior limb with the hand at one end and the shoulder at the other one with the biceps in between.

data.name: delapouite/armadillo
data.description: This stripped animal from America has a leather armor shell and can morph into a defensive ball.

data.name: delapouite/armor-downgrade
data.description: Defense decreasing, more vulnerability to expect.

data.name: delapouite/armor-punch
data.description: A metal fist in a gauntlet hitting at full speed.

data.name: delapouite/armor-upgrade
data.description: Defense increasing, more protection. Immunity has been granted thanks to this power-up.

data.name: delapouite/armored-boomerang
data.description: Try to hunt a heavy kangaroo with it to see if it goes back to you.

data.name: delapouite/arrest
data.description: A bad guy under arrest by the police who must show his empty hands and obey the orders. Or it could be a threatened hostage.

data.name: delapouite/arrow-cursor
data.description: Guide this pointer on the screen by moving the mouse. Then click to trigger an action on the graphical interface.

data.name: delapouite/arrow-wings
data.description: This arrow belongs to the bow of cupidon, it has an autopilot system.

data.name: delapouite/ascending-block
data.description: Big stone block being pulled along a slope to build a pyramid. No slaves involved.

data.name: delapouite/asian-lantern
data.description: Warm but soft light shining from this paper box with inscriptions.

data.name: delapouite/asparagus
data.description: A vegetable crop also called sparrow grass.

data.name: delapouite/aspergillum
data.description: A metal stick used by priests to sprinkle holy water during ceremonies.

data.name: delapouite/asteroid
data.description: A big rock floating in space that should not smash anything. There's a high concentration of them between Mars and Jupiter.

data.name: delapouite/astronaut-helmet
data.description: To let cosmonauts breath in the void and protect their brain from deadly space rays.

data.name: delapouite/atlas
data.description: Titan god of endurance and astronomy doomed to carry the globe on its shoulders, in an infinite torment.

data.name: delapouite/atom-core
data.description: Electrons rotating around a nucleus made of protons and neutrons.

data.name: delapouite/attached-shield
data.description: When you receive a blow on the other side, you better grab it forcefully to defend your life.

data.name: delapouite/audio-cassette
data.description: Magnetic tape from the 80s to record analog music on both faces and play it in a Walkman.

data.name: delapouite/australia
data.description: Big island or continent? It was the last huge land conquered by colonists against native aboriginal people.

data.name: delapouite/avocado
data.description: A big berry with one seed used to produce guacamole.

data.name: delapouite/avoidance
data.description: The collision was avoided by bending the trajectories.

data.name: delapouite/axe-in-log
data.description: A lumberjack is having a break after the tree is on down the forest floor on all branches have been stripped.

data.name: delapouite/axe-sword
data.description: Symbol of lumberjack warriors.

data.name: delapouite/baby-bottle
data.description: Good milk when mum can't naturally feed the starving kid.

data.name: delapouite/baby-face
data.description: A toothless smile from a young child, amazed by everything's going on in the surroundings.

data.name: delapouite/babyfoot-players
data.description: Rows of metal soldiers kicking in a ball on a miniature soccer field. This is the kind of game found in bars.

data.name: delapouite/backgammon
data.description: Roll the dice to move the checker on the correct triangles.

data.name: delapouite/backpack
data.description: Huge bag with lots of pockets to carry the whole objects inventory and common equipment during a hiking trip.

data.name: delapouite/backward-time
data.description: This clock is going in the counter-clockwise direction, which means it travels to the past.

data.name: delapouite/bacon
data.description: Two stripes of salt-cured pork from parts with a lot of fat.

data.name: delapouite/bad-breath
data.description: Horrible odor coming from a zombie teeth made of rotten food or organs decomposition.

data.name: delapouite/ball-pyramid
data.description: A stack of spheres that remain in perfect balance. It also looks like a pool game seen from above.

data.name: delapouite/ballerina-shoes
data.description: Pointy light shoes for star dancers during ballets at the opera. Need strong toes to keep the balance.

data.name: delapouite/balloon-dog
data.description: This brittle and temporary creation fears spikes and strong winds. These kind of balloons often belon to clowns.

data.name: delapouite/bamboo-fountain
data.description: A quiet water tap in Asian gardens around ponds. Every few seconds the tube is filled and the liqud is poured in a bigger recipient.

data.name: delapouite/bamboo
data.description: Fast growing wooden tubes exploited for constructions.

data.name: delapouite/banana-bunch
data.description: A trio of juicy yellow bananas ready to be harvest. Cook them to produce a mighty meal, like in the Yiga Clan recipe.

data.name: delapouite/banana-peel
data.description:
A slippery skin on the floor is a frightening hazard.
During a Mario Kart race, banana peels are often left on the track by Donkey Kong and non attentive drivers skid out of the stage.

data.name: delapouite/banana-peeled
data.description: The peel has been removed and it's ready to be eaten as a dessert.

data.name: delapouite/banana
data.description: Tropical fruit long and yellow, loved by monkeys. Some people also called them plantains.

data.name: delapouite/bandit
data.description: A villain hiding its face behind a kerchief, about to rob a bank or a coach.

data.name: delapouite/banging-gavel
data.description: At the tribunal court, the verdict can't be pronounced if the crowd is noisy.

data.name: delapouite/bank
data.description: Safe place to store money and credits. Despite heavy protection by the police, banks are often the target of robberies and hold-ups.

data.name: delapouite/banknote
data.description: Money printed on paper for different amounts. Banknotes are lighter than their equivalents in coins.

data.name: delapouite/barbarian
data.description: A muscular warrior that may go berserk during battles. This kind of brutal man looks like a hero but is often outwitted by his opponents.

data.name: delapouite/barbecue
data.description: To cook meat outdoor in the garden during a week-end party. It needs the right sauce to get even tastier.

data.name: delapouite/barn
data.description: Warehouse to store sacks of grain, crops, haystacks or agricultural tractors in a farm.

data.name: delapouite/barracks-tent

data.description: A juicy ball with stripes full of water and sugar. Beware of the see while eating its flesh.

data.name: delapouite/wave-surfer
data.description: This cool dude is chilling in the ocean on his surf board.

data.name: delapouite/wax-tablet
data.description: A writing surface used in Antiquity more robust that normal paper but needing a stylus to be engraved.

data.name: delapouite/weight-lifting-down
data.description: All muscles ready for the effort… now it's time to impress other body builders in the gym.

data.name: delapouite/weight-lifting-up
data.description: Strength and mental are the key to the discipline if you want big muscles.

data.name: delapouite/weight
data.description:
A heavy block of metal to measure gravity attraction.
The unit can be in kilogram if it follows the metric system or in pounds.

data.name: delapouite/well
data.description: A deep pit with water at the bottom that you need to collect with a bucket attached to a long rope.

data.name: delapouite/western-hat
data.description: Cowboy's protection from the hot sun of American deserts during long horse rides.

data.name: delapouite/whale-tail
data.description: Whales swim back to the surface of the ocean to breath and when they dive down, they produce a big splash with their tail.

data.name: delapouite/wheelbarrow
data.description: Carry concrete or dirt around the garden during houses constructions.

data.name: delapouite/whisk
data.description: Let's prepare some tasty mayonnaise with this tool that needs to be agitated.

data.name: delapouite/whistle
data.description: Produce a strident sound. Used by referees to signal penalties or end of games.

data.name: delapouite/wind-turbine
data.description: A modern wind mill to turn infinite supply of atmosphere moves into renewable green energy.

data.name: delapouite/windmill
data.description: This mill uses the wind to crush cereals and produce flour.

data.name: delapouite/window-bars
data.description: In a prison cell, there should be no way to escape even if you have a sharp file.

data.name: delapouite/window
data.description: Open the curtains, then the window and finally the shutters to breath the fresh air coming into the room.

data.name: delapouite/windpump
data.description:
This thin tower extracts water from the soil using a wind powered pump.
The irrigation system can then provide energy to crops and farm animals.

data.name: delapouite/windsock
data.description:
A stripped tube to see the wind direction and intensity in airports.
In case of storm the cone floats horizontally.

data.name: delapouite/wine-bottle
data.description:
This red wine is made of grapes coming from the best French vineyards near Bordeaux.
A corkscrew is mandatory to open it.

data.name: delapouite/winged-scepter
data.description: This expensive staff belongs to a monarch who lives in a floating castle, high in the sky.

data.name: delapouite/winter-gloves
data.description: To keep the hands warm when playing with the cold snow.

data.name: delapouite/winter-hat
data.description: A beanie to keep the head warm in the cold blizzard.

data.name: delapouite/wire-coil
data.description: A string of metal to build electrical circuits.

data.name: delapouite/wireframe-globe
data.description: The meridians of a planet to get the right coordinates.

data.name: delapouite/wisdom
data.description: A scholar with a long beard and infinite knowledge.

data.name: delapouite/wizard-face
data.description:
An old white magician hidden under the shadow of his hat and his thick beard.
A sorcerer like this can summon powerful magic entities and spirit avatars.

data.name: delapouite/woman-elf-face
data.description: Immortal being living in harmony with the forest.

data.name: delapouite/wood-beam
data.description: Thick plank to build a house frame.

data.name: delapouite/wood-cabin
data.description: Cosy lumberjack habitation in the forest with everything needed to tame the wilderness.

data.name: delapouite/wood-canoe
data.description: A small boat to go across a river and catch fish.

data.name: delapouite/wood-club
data.description: A prehistorical heavy piece of tree to smash mammoth heads in a fierce but uncontrolled blow.

data.name: delapouite/wood-pile
data.description: Branches and small trunks gathered in a forest by a lumberjack to be used as fuel for a fire.

data.name: delapouite/wood-stick
data.description: A twig with no leaves left. May be used to start a fire.

data.name: delapouite/wooden-chair
data.description: A stable seat to play board games during long sessions. Or have a lunch around a table.

data.name: delapouite/wooden-clogs
data.description: Hard shoes carved from wood used in old times.

data.name: delapouite/wooden-crate
data.description: This kind of box is kept in storehouses before being used to transport things over long distances.

data.name: delapouite/wooden-pegleg
data.description: The original member must have been eaten by a shark. Now the limb of the pirate has been replaced by a piece of the mast.

data.name: delapouite/wooden-pier
data.description: A long old wharf on the seashore to fish or watching the ocean horizon. Can be used as a small harbor, to attach boats with ropes.

data.name: delapouite/wool
data.description: A yarn of Long strings of fibers made from sheep fur and used to weave warm clothes like shirts or pants.

data.name: delapouite/worms
data.description: Maggots leaving underground and good bait for fishing.

data.name: delapouite/xylophone
data.description: A music instrument with sticks hitting wooden plates often used to produce childish melodies.

data.name: delapouite/yarn
data.description: A thread tied in a knot.

data.name: delapouite/yin-yang
data.description: An Asian precept advocating the right balance between light and dark forces in life.

data.name: delapouite/zat-gun
data.description:
Laser gun in a cobra shape used by alien civilizations.
Some versions only shot a bolt to temporarily stun a guard.

data.name: delapouite/zigzag-hieroglyph
data.description: Two waves of water to depict the fertility of the Nile river.

data.name: delapouite/zipper
data.description: Metal piece on a jacket or on pants to close two distant parts in a quick gesture.

data.name: faithtoken/card-discard
data.description: Disposal of a card. Other players may be able to freely pick it afterwards to improve their deck.

data.name: faithtoken/card-draw
data.description: Grab the card on top of the stack.

data.name: faithtoken/card-pick
data.description: Pick the right card depending of your overall strategy.

data.name: faithtoken/card-random
data.description: Don't choose yourself, just let the destiny do its job and hope for the best outcome, if the deck was shuffled enough.

data.name: faithtoken/dragon-head
data.description: No more breathing fire from this gigantic lifeless skull which looks like a quiet crocodile.

data.name: faithtoken/forward-sun
data.description: Switch the star in the right direction.

data.name: faithtoken/minerals
data.description: Crystals or emeralds ready to be mined.

data.name: faithtoken/nautilus-shell
data.description: A marine mollusc often considered a living fossils.

data.name: faithtoken/ninja-star
data.description: A metal blade spinning like a boomerang with no return. It's sharp enough to remain stuck in the target.

data.name: faithtoken/ore
data.description: Precious resource harvested in the deep of mines. It can be gold, emeralds or even opals.

data.name: felbrigg/dodge
data.description: Avoiding an obstacle on a windy road with a smooth curved trajectory and no collision.

data.name: felbrigg/overhead
data.description: Move vertically from top around an invisible axis.

data.name: felbrigg/sideswipe
data.description: Sliding move from right to left.

data.name: felbrigg/thrust
data.description: Go ahead, full power.

data.name: felbrigg/underhand
data.description: Move from above.

data.name: generalace135/fingers-crossed
data.description: Sign of superstition when you hope for good luck.

data.name: generalace135/shepherds-crook
data.description: A wooden stick used to show the way to sheep.

data.name: guard13007/pause-button
data.description: To temporally stop a music or a movie.

data.name: guard13007/play-button
data.description: To start the listening of a tune or a video.

data.name: guard13007/soda-can
data.description: A tin can with sparkling and sugary beverage to drink with another piece of junk food like burgers.

data.name: heavenly-dog/catapult
data.description: Medieval war machine throwing heavy rocks or dead bodies to destroy fortresses walls.

data.name: heavenly-dog/defensive-wall
data.description:
Thick castle wall very hard to climb upon or destroy, except if you attack it
with something like a trebuchet.

data.name: irongamer/armored-pants
data.description: Heavy trousers made of thick layers to protect the legs.

data.name: john-colburn/pistol-gun
data.description:
A light gun ready to fire bullets. During a pursuit, both the police and bad
guys respectively pull the trigger until there's no ammo left.

data.name: john-redman/paper
data.description: A palm that can cover stones but vulnerable to small blades.

data.name: john-redman/rock
data.description: A fist that can smash metal blades, like scissors easily.

data.name: john-redman/scissors
data.description: Ready to tear a paper apart during a shifumi tournament but is vulnerable to rocks.

data.name: kier-heyl/dwarf-helmet
data.description: Dwarves deserve thick helmets to protect them from falling stones while mining, especially in Moria.

data.name: kier-heyl/dwarf-king
data.description: The helmet of the mine emperor with a rune at the center to show its royal rank.

data.name: kier-heyl/elf-helmet
data.description: A long helm with wing-shaped protections on the side and a narrow star for the noise.

data.name: lorc/ace
data.description: Despite being situated at the beginning of the suit, it can defeat the king in a card game most of the time.

data.name: lorc/acid-blob
data.description: Corrosive contact with the skin that leaves deep burning wounds and possible scars.

data.name: lorc/acorn
data.description: A precious collectible for squirrels who live in a oak. During autumn, these nuts cover the floor of forests.

data.name: lorc/aerial-signal
data.description: Network reception through WIFI or BlueTooth.

data.name: lorc/aerodynamic-harpoon
data.description: A arrow head with move stripes.

data.name: lorc/aerosol
data.description: A spray to tag walls and paint graphic creation in abandoned parts of cities.

data.name: lorc/afterburn
data.description: A turbo propulsion to travel at high speed, breaking the wall of sound.

data.name: lorc/air-zigzag
data.description: Not in a straight fashion.

data.name: lorc/alien-fire
data.description: A spectral entity coming from another planet.

data.name: lorc/alien-skull
data.description: A dead cranium with long and sharp fangs. Truth is elsewhere, on another planet.

data.name: lorc/alien-stare
data.description: Encounter of the third type when you face this monster from a distant planet of the outerspace.

data.name: lorc/all-for-one
data.description: \"All for one, one for all\
__parsed_extra: a musketeers apology praising team work to defeat foes."

data.name: lorc/alligator-clip
data.description: A sharp plier head to clip wires and remove extraneous plastic.

data.name: lorc/ammonite-fossil
data.description: A petrified marine creature trapped in the ocean floor. One of the first complex living organism.

data.name: lorc/ammonite
data.description: A very old marine specie of mollusk which used to live in the ocean during ancient times.Nowadays it's mostly encountered as a fossil.

data.name: lorc/anatomy
data.description: Vital organs inside a human organism to help surgeons.

data.name: lorc/anchor
data.description:
The favorite tattoo of sailors on their arms.
This huge hook of metal is attached to the floor of the sea to keep boats in stationary position.

data.name: lorc/android-mask
data.description: A robot face with sharp edges.

data.name: lorc/andromeda-chain
data.description: The favorite metal whip of one of the Zodiac Knights. It's composed of metal links connected together.

data.name: lorc/angel-outfit
data.description: A holy halo above the head and strong wings in the back to be disguised as a soldier of God.

data.name: lorc/angel-wings
data.description: Holy feathers to reach Paradise and fly through the clouds watching over mortals.

data.name: lorc/angler-fish
data.description:
Appealing light source in the darkness of abysses.
In Donkey Kong Country 2, Glimmer the Angler Fish helps Diddy and Dixie to find their way through flooded ship wrecks.

data.name: lorc/angular-spider
data.description: This one could fit as an emblem for a modern super hero.

data.name: lorc/animal-skull
data.description: Angular cheekbones and spiky teeth for this bestial cranium.

data.name: lorc/ankh
data.description: A precious artifact that fits perfectly in Lara Croft's mansion after running after it during the 4th episode of her adventures.

data.name: lorc/anthem
data.description:
Hymn to rally the troops under a same nation feeling.
Crowds often intone this heroic melody to support their sport team.

data.name: lorc/anvil-impact
data.description:
A blacksmith smashing a hammer to beat hot steel in his forge to conceive blades.
In this smithy, horseshoes can also be produced.

data.name: lorc/anvil
data.description: Everytime you need to forge a mighty sword, a skillfull blacksmith will easily transform bare metal to the right shape.

data.name: lorc/apple-maggot
data.description:
This fruit is not rotten yet, but no one will ever want to take a bite at it.
The apple is soiled by a cydia worm that reveals the internals and the seed.

data.name: lorc/apple-seeds
data.description: Better remove them before eating the apple if you don't want to have a tree growing in your belly.

data.name: lorc/archery-target
data.description: Aim the arrow straight to the center if you want to earn maximum points.

data.name: lorc/architect-mask
data.description: Eyes wide opened and no mouth for this disturbing alien shape head.

data.name: lorc/arcing-bolt
data.description: A nice projectile curve for this ball which may finish right into the basket.

data.name: lorc/armadillo-tail
data.description: This heavily armoured tail could be used as a whip or a natural blade when the animal is not rolling.

data.name: lorc/armor-vest
data.description: Protect your body from terrible wounds.

data.name: lorc/armoured-shell
data.description: Some tailor take their inspiration from the nature in order to replicate the best it has to offer : here's the imitation of chestnut to get a harmful suit.

data.name: lorc/arrow-cluster
data.description: 3 arrows supporting each others. Which one will be shot by the archer?

data.name: lorc/arrow-dunk
data.description: Throw an object over an obstacle.

data.name: lorc/arrow-flights
data.description: It's raining arrows.

data.name: lorc/arrow-scope
data.description: Find the right spot during a drone attack.

data.name: lorc/arrowed
data.description: If Achille can endure lots of bow injuries without suffering (except in the heel as the legend tells us), that is not the case for the common warrior.

data.name: lorc/arrowhead
data.description: To aim at the right target, an arrow needs to be well balanced, with an aerodynamic shape.

data.name: lorc/arrows-shield
data.description: A shield must be big enough to protect all vital part of the body while traversing an arrows rain.

data.name: lorc/arson
data.description: Flames propagate through a whole city, from house to house with only water and courage to stop them.

data.name: lorc/artificial-hive
data.description: An hexagonal grid like structure looking like a bee nest. Could also be a security system that requires a special key.

data.name: lorc/assassin-pocket
data.description: 3 small daggers that can be easily hidden.

data.name: lorc/at-sea
data.description:
Sailors and members of the Navy spend their lives striding the vast oceans that cover the planet.
Beware of huge waves and high tides coming from the horizon.

data.name: lorc/atomic-slashes
data.description: Slashes gravitating like electrons around a central core.

data.name: lorc/aubergine
data.description: Purple vegetable particularly used to cook Greek moussakas. Can be called eggplant.

data.name: lorc/aura
data.description: A spectral energy field surrounding a living organism. This is slowly pulsating.

data.name: lorc/auto-repair
data.description:
No need to go to the mechanic with this spanner which provides immediate fixes.
Just turn the wrench clockwise and the cog will fit the right position in the engine.

data.name: lorc/autogun
data.description: Use a movement sensor to fire bullets to any unidentified target.

data.name: lorc/automatic-sas
data.description: Airlock door with a credential access.

data.name: lorc/awareness
data.description: Be one with the surrounding environment by keeping all your senses wide open.

data.name: lorc/axe-in-stump
data.description: Lumberjacks tool to split wood in forest.

data.name: lorc/axe-swing
data.description: A large cutting movement to break a neck in one strike.

data.name: lorc/back-forth
data.description: The way to handle rams when a gate need to be destroyed. Or can be used to swap objects during an exchange.

data.name: lorc/back-pain
data.description: Time to consult a chiropractor after too much heavy lifting.

data.name: lorc/backbone-shell
data.description: Like a rounded spine polished by water.

data.name: lorc/backstab
data.description:
Some people consider this attack to be a traitor's one. In the other hand, self proclaimed connoisseurs argue that it is the conclusion of the honorable silent hunt.
An art only mastered by the best spies.

data.name: lorc/backup
data.description: This army of clones are reinforcements for the team when hope's getting brittle.

data.name: lorc/ball-glow
data.description: A captive bolt is about to escape through the cracks of this damaged receptacle.

data.name: lorc/ball-heart
data.description: A plain heart shape with a round globe inside it.

data.name: lorc/balloons
data.description:
Let's throw a party with a clown and kids running in the garden.
Balloons can travel across borders or even reach the upper atmosphere if filled with helium gas.

data.name: lorc/bandage-roll
data.description: How to quickly fix a bleeding wound while lost alone in a wild forest? Solid Snake reckons this medical tape is quite handy.

data.name: lorc/bandaged
data.description: A good embalming guaranties your rotten body to survive through the centuries as a scary mummy.

data.name: lorc/barbed-arrow
data.description: To build fences quickly with a bow in front of enemy lines.

data.name: lorc/barbed-coil
data.description: Metal rope to protect barriers and camps. This coil forms a spiral.

data.name: lorc/barbed-nails
data.description: Scratchy fingers eventually leaving deep traces.

data.name: lorc/barbed-spear
data.description:
Almost the same principal has a fishing hook.
When you remove the rip from the flesh, it creates lots more damages than the other way around.

data.name: lorc/barbed-star
data.description: 5 branches with spiky points.

data.name: lorc/barbed-sun
data.description: A core surrounded with spiky circles.

data.name: lorc/barbed-wire
data.description: To build a fence around a field or a camp. This may also be a spiky crown.

data.name: lorc/barbute
data.description: A strong protective helmet to preserve knights brains with narrow visor.

data.name: lorc/barefoot
data.description: Without shoes, it's nicer to feel the ground under the skin and between the toes.

data.name: lorc/bat-blade
data.description: The dagger of one of Bruce Wayne ancestor.

data.name: lorc/bat-wing
data.description: It's also the name of Bruce Wayne's personal aircraft.

data.name: lorc/battered-axe
data.description: This one is not as shiny as the one in Golden Axe, but dwarfs don't mind making their way with a sharp blade.

data.name: lorc/batteries
data.description: Small electrical energy containers required by toys and devices.

data.name: lorc/battle-axe
data.description:
The right blade to cut on the way down but also on the way up.
If's usually handled by dwarf warriors.

data.name: lorc/battle-gear
data.description: Complete equipment is essential as long as you can carry all you inventory in a tiny back pack, like in Baldur's Gate.

data.name: lorc/battle-tank
data.description: A heavy-armored tank preparing to aim to the other side of the enemy line.

data.name: lorc/batwing-emblem
data.description: This symbol can fit above the gate of Dracula's mansion to scare away wanderers.

data.name: lorc/beam-wake
data.description: A huge laser coming from outer space.

data.name: lorc/beams-aura
data.description: Rays of light shining around someone to depict a high level of energy. (usually over 9000)

data.name: lorc/beanstalk
data.description: A giant magical ladder made of vegetable leading Jack to the cloud.

data.name: lorc/beard
data.description: Facial hair with a large mustache to look like a respectable lord or a wise scientist.

data.name: lorc/beast-eye
data.description: The pupil of a snake is often narrower than humans one. Some can even see in the dark.

data.name: lorc/bee
data.description: Visiting a hive with your honey is not always a walk in the park, Diddy and Dixie Kong are pretty sure of it.

data.name: lorc/beech
data.description: This tree is a living piece of wood ready to be turned into timber.

data.name: lorc/beer-stein
data.description: Popular alcohol in taverns to get slowly drunk. It's made of cereals and bubbles.

data.name: lorc/beetle-shell
data.description: Some insect abandons their protective exoskeleton to get a new one when their current shell becomes to narrow.

data.name: lorc/behold
data.description: An floating eye, cousin of Metroids. Very focused on spying and observing.

data.name: lorc/bell-shield
data.description: A protective magic aura surrounding this body.

data.name: lorc/belt-buckles
data.description: A leather string to support pants and jeans.

data.name: lorc/bestial-fangs
data.description: Impressive incisors, sharp as razors.

data.name: lorc/beveled-star
data.description: A star with solid sides.

data.name: lorc/big-wave
data.description:
A tsunami coming from the ocean, engulfing everything on the shore.
This gigantic wave is pure joy for surfers.

data.name: lorc/biohazard
data.description:
A warning sign about a contamination area that should be avoided without a proper suit.
This zone is potentially radioactive.

data.name: lorc/bird-claw
data.description: Bird powerful feet with pointy toes. An eagle can carry light preys to its nest in a grasp.

data.name: lorc/bird-limb
data.description: A lower chicken leg, the upper part above the foot is missing.

data.name: lorc/bird-mask
data.description: How to look like the villain Mother-Father of Zenoclash or a nasty plague doctor.

data.name: lorc/bird-twitter
data.description: Singing in the woods to protect its territory.

data.name: lorc/black-bar
data.description: A brick made of dark chocolate or charcoal that may be burned as fuel.

data.name: lorc/black-flag
data.description:
A dark standard over a light disc that could belong to a pirate crew.
Can be found at the top of ship mast hunting in a treasure bay.

data.name: lorc/black-hand-shield
data.description: This wide human palm is a symbol of power painted negatively on this protective plate.

data.name: lorc/black-hole-bolas
data.description: A spiral with balls gravitating around, like a gigantic trap during the Dreamtime.

data.name: lorc/blackball
data.description:
To score a strike at bowling, you need to have the right ball for your hand.
It is so shiny that it looks like it's made of glass.

data.name: lorc/blackcurrant
data.description: A dark berry which may be turned into juice or jam to spread on cakes.

data.name: lorc/blade-bite
data.description: A dead cranium happily biting a dagger between its teeth like if it was a fake knife.

data.name: lorc/blade-drag
data.description: A big sword blow in slow motion where every stream of cool air is clearly depicted.

data.name: lorc/blade-fall
data.description: A judgement in slow motion, just before the hit.

data.name: lorc/bleeding-eye
data.description: This injured eye is about to turn blind. Blood tears can be used in magic potion.

data.name: lorc/bleeding-heart
data.description: This organ has a leak somewhere, spreading love.

data.name: lorc/bleeding-wound
data.description: Fresh cut in the skin with blood pouring.

data.name: lorc/bloody-stash
data.description: A quick claw movement.

data.name: lorc/bloody-sword
data.description: A sharp blade with drops of fresh life juice.

data.name: lorc/blunderbuss
data.description: A pirate gun like the one used by Kaptain K. Rool.

data.name: lorc/boar-tusks
data.description: A deadly weapon against the fat belly of King Robert Baratheon in Game of Thrones.

data.name: lorc/body-swapping
data.description: Internal teleportation like an exchange of souls.

data.name: lorc/boiling-bubbles
data.description: Living surface of a strange potion. Or it could simply be soap.

data.name: lorc/bolas
data.description: Primitive but efficient capture device that tangles preys legs.

data.name: lorc/bolt-eye
data.description: This gaze is full of energy. Could be the god of thunder looking right at its opponent.

data.name: lorc/bolt-saw
data.description: Circling electricity that can both cut and burn.

data.name: lorc/bolt-shield
data.description: An electrified metal plate.

data.name: lorc/bolter-gun
data.description: A smaller version of the full bullet launcher.

data.name: lorc/bombing-run
data.description: Death from above, Enola Gay's dropping Fat Boys for a massive explosion.

data.name: lorc/bone-gnawer
data.description: Dogs are a good example that chewing a hard piece an ulna is a healthy habit.

data.name: lorc/bone-knife
data.description: A rudimentary weapon sculpted from a previous victim.

data.name: lorc/book-aura
data.description: A radiance enlightening old pages filled with wisdom.

data.name: lorc/book-cover
data.description: A hard leather envelope around a precious knowledge content. This codex is the key to wisdom.

data.name: lorc/book-storm
data.description: Knowledge can be a electrical surge in a bright mind, like during an Eureka moment.

data.name: lorc/bookmark
data.description: To keep track of the last page you read.

data.name: lorc/bookmarklet
data.description: To keep track of the last page where your eyes decided to give up.

data.name: lorc/boomerang-sun
data.description: Spinning angles around a gravitational point.

data.name: lorc/boot-kick
data.description: A small impact with the tip of this boot.

data.name: lorc/boot-prints
data.description: Trace on the ground along a path, easy to follow by a smuggler.

data.name: lorc/boot-stomp
data.description: Smash an insect loudly with your foot.

data.name: lorc/boots
data.description: A pair of waterproof heavy shoes.

data.name: lorc/bordered-shield
data.description: The sides of this shield are as robust as its middle.

data.name: lorc/bottle-vapors
data.description: Unless it's a nice perfume, breathing these fumes could lead to unexpected effects.

data.name: lorc/bottled-bolt
data.description: Trapping a bolt in a small container is like putting the electrical Gremlins into the answer machine.

data.name: lorc/bottom-right-3d-arrow
data.description: A corner indicated in depth with precision.

data.name: lorc/bouncing-sword
data.description: This weapon reacts like a boomerang, it follow angles, edges and corners of the surroundings to reach its target.

data.name: lorc/bowie-knife
data.description: Crocodile Dundee tooth stick.

data.name: lorc/bowl-spiral
